lines.text:
[looking into microscope]
Alright. What am I looking at?

John Doe Number Two's brain. Took a .45 caliber bullet through the forehead. That is not human brain tissue. I mean I guess it could be it just doesn't look like any brain I've ever seen. The structure's so uniform, simple.
Well, what kind of brain is it?
If I had to compare it to something, I don't know, maybe dolphin.
Oh, no, of course it is. Marshall was shooting at these people and an unfortunate dolphin swam into the line of fire.
It's every man for himself out there. That's the game. Those are the rules. That's what I've learned. That's what I know. That's what gets you ahead! You gonna blame me for playing by the rules?
In our world, we take on all the pain, and all the joy, of another, instantly.
You can't know what's gonna happen. Nobody can.
Henry, with every move we make we change the world. "Drinking a bowl of green tea, I stopped a war". It's from a poem.
